Title: Moving On
Description:
With the Bronze Oathstone restored, Alexstrasza can proceed with her plan.

Travel to Valdrakken, $n. She will want to hear of your success.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Alexstrasza at the Seat of the Aspects in Valdrakken.
RewardText: $n, please accept our most sincere gratitude for all you have done for us. I will let you know when the time comes to accompany me on this next step.
